keywords.name: Experimental
keywords.definition: Requires an additional Order Test; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: BotB
keywords.definition: Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Battle of the Bulge

keywords.name: I-SUB
keywords.definition: Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly

keywords.name: Act with Courage
keywords.definition: All units within 12in ignore one pin when making order test. Must still test even with one pin; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 125

keywords.name: Act with Initiative
keywords.definition: At the start of each turn, roll a D6. On a roll of 4+ you receive the first order die of the turn; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 125

keywords.name: Rear Echelon Squad
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 112

keywords.name: FSSF Section
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 114

keywords.name: FSSF Scouts
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 114

keywords.name: Freddie's Freighters
keywords.definition: Can move through impassable mountainous/hilly terrain; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Masters of Concealment
keywords.definition: Shortened detection range when Hidden; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Recon Troops
keywords.definition: Can spot hidden units at 18in; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 114

keywords.name: Escape Reaction
keywords.definition: When Attacked or Assault, may issue a run order and move up to 6in away from the attacking unit; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 114

keywords.name: Jittery
keywords.definition: When performing an order test, Doulbe 1s count as a FUBAR, like Double 6s; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 112

keywords.name: The Black Death
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 115

keywords.name: Light Recognition
keywords.definition: Increase Night Detection Range by 6in; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 115

keywords.name: Ivory Handle Pistol Pair
keywords.definition: Ivory Handle Pistol Pair has Shots:2; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 115

keywords.name: Ranger Force T12
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 116

keywords.name: Colonel Gavin
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 125

keywords.name: Colonel Darby
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 125

keywords.name: Colonel Frederick
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: General Patton
keywords.definition: Campaign Unit - Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: Shoot 'n' Scoot
keywords.definition: After resolving a Fire Order, may make a reverse move; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 116

keywords.name: Hold'em by the Nose and Kick'em in the Ass!
keywords.definition: Outflanking Units may come in 12in further than normal; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: I Won't Subsidise Cowardice!
keywords.definition: Units within 12in of Patton have their Morale raised by 1 and Reroll Failed Morale Tests. (Order Tests are not Morale Tests); Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: Ol' Blood'n'Guts!
keywords.definition: In a Scenario with Victory Points, if Patton is defeated, the opponent gains 2 VPs; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: We're Gonna Go Through Them Like crap Through Goose!
keywords.definition: After setup, but before the first turn of the game as a part of beginning of game actions, all units that are deployed on the board may make a Run Move; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: Lead From the Front
keywords.definition: When a unit is within 12in of a Company or Platoon Commander, they may ignore one pin when making order test. Must still test even with one pin; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 127

keywords.name: Able Leadership
keywords.definition: All Units with 'Rangers Lead the Way!' within 12in ignore one pin when making order test. Must still test even with one pin; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 116

keywords.name: Achnacarry Training
keywords.definition: Can move through impassable mountainous/hilly terrain; Bolt Action 2nd Edition Campaign Book: Italy: Soft Underbelly: Pg. 107

keywords.name: Test Bed
keywords.definition: Requires an additional Order Test; Swedish Unofficial Rules

keywords.name: 360° Arc
keywords.definition: Can Fire all around; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 135

keywords.name: Right Arc
keywords.definition: Can Fire Right Arc; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 135

keywords.name: Left Arc
keywords.definition: Can Fire Left Arc; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 135

keywords.name: Front and Side Arcs
keywords.definition: Can Fire Forward, Left, and Right Arcs; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 135

keywords.name: Pintle
keywords.definition: Flak; When fired against a Ground Target, makes the unit Open Topped until end of Turn; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 136

keywords.name: Improved HE
keywords.definition: Increase HE Value by 1 (I.E. From HE 1in to HE 2in); Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Coaxial
keywords.definition: Must choose between firing the Main Gun or Coaxial Weapon; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 135

keywords.name: Airborne Carriage
keywords.definition: When the Unit is taken as Airborne, this weapon counts as Light for Towing Purposes; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Empty Pylons
keywords.definition: When you have no ordinance, gain Interceptor Keyword. May Jettison Ordinance, lose Ordinance for the remainder of the game.

keywords.name: Soft Skin
keywords.definition: Destroyed on a Damage Roll of 6+; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 6+
keywords.definition: Destroyed on a Damage Roll of 6+; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 7+
keywords.definition: Damage Roll of 7 Rolls on Superficial Damage Chart. 8+ Rolls on Damage Chart; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 8+
keywords.definition: Damage Roll of 8 Rolls on Superficial Damage Chart. 9+ Rolls on Damage Chart; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 9+
keywords.definition: Damage Roll of 9 Rolls on Superficial Damage Chart. 10+ Rolls on Damage Chart; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 10+
keywords.definition: Damage Roll of 10 Rolls on Superficial Damage Chart. 11+ Rolls on Damage Chart; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Damage 11+
keywords.definition: Damage Roll of 11 Rolls on Superficial Damage Chart. 12+ Rolls on Damage Chart; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 138

keywords.name: Multiple Launcher
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Cumbersome
keywords.definition: This weapon counts as Heavy for Movement. Counts as a vehicle for number of shots; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Intelligence Training
keywords.definition: Once Per Game, may attempt to go first in a turn; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Selection - Heavy Weapons Team
keywords.definition: May be taken instead of a Mortar or Machine Gun Team in a Heavy Weapons Platoon; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Gun Shield
keywords.definition: Grants Soft Cover to the Crew from Small Arms fire that comes from the Front Arc; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: HE 1in
keywords.definition: Use 1in Template to determine hits. Pen +1 when HE is used; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: HE 2in
keywords.definition: Use 2in Template to determine hits. Pen +2 when HE is used; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: HE 3in
keywords.definition: Use 3in Template to determine hits. Pen +3 when HE is used; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: HE 4in
keywords.definition: Use 4in Template to determine hits. Pen +4 when HE is used; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: Interceptor
keywords.definition: Can attack other Warplanes; Bolt Action Community Experimental Rules

keywords.name: Barbed Wire
keywords.definition: Impassable to Infantry and Unarmored Vehicles; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 296

keywords.name: Dug In
keywords.definition: Additional Protection for Units Dug In; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 294

keywords.name: Anti-Tank Ditches
keywords.definition: Impassable to Wheeled Vehicles and Artillery; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 296

keywords.name: Liason Officer
keywords.definition: Counts as an Forward Air Observer; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Ambush Tactics
keywords.definition: May start game in Ambush. When in Ambush, +1 to Base Morale Value; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Anti-Tank Gun
keywords.definition: AT Guns when using a Fire Order (incl. Ambush) have +1 to Hit when targetting Vehicles; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 96

keywords.name: Wheeled
keywords.definition: Advance: 12in; Run: 24in; Doubled on Roads; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 133

keywords.name: Half-Tracked
keywords.definition: Advance: 9in; Run: 18in; Doubled on Roads; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 133

keywords.name: Assault
keywords.definition: Negate Movement Penalty when Shooting. Grants Tough Fighters to Models equipped with a weapon that has the Assault Special Rule; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 96

keywords.name: Behind Enemy Lines
keywords.definition: When Outflanking, ignores -1 to Order Test when coming onto the board; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Fixed
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 96

keywords.name: Flak
keywords.definition: Can attack aircraft during an Airstrike; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 117

keywords.name: Flamethrower
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: High Explosive
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: Howitzer
keywords.definition: Can shoot Direct or Indirect; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: Indirect Fire
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: Multiple Launcher
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 102

keywords.name: One Shot
keywords.definition: Can be fired once per game. One shot Weapons can Split Fire; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 97

keywords.name: Shaped Charge
keywords.definition: No -1 Pen for Long Range. No +1 Pen for Point-Blank; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 103

keywords.name: Smoke Shells
keywords.definition: Can fire Smoke Screen. See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 128

keywords.name: Team weapon
keywords.definition: Suffers -1 to Hit when reduced to a single model; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 103

keywords.name: Open Topped
keywords.definition: Takes Pins from any hits. Additional +1 to Pen and +1 to Damage against top armor; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: Bicycles
keywords.definition: When moving entirely on a road, on Run Orders, may move 24in; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 119

keywords.name: Cavalry
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 119

keywords.name: Engineers
keywords.definition: Negates Defenders Bonus when assulting into fortifications/defences; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 120

keywords.name: Fanatics
keywords.definition: Ignore Pin Modifiers on Morale Checks. Loses in Close Combat count as Draws; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 120

keywords.name: Fieldcraft
keywords.definition: Treats rough ground as Open; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 120

keywords.name: Green
keywords.definition: When a unit with Green suffer their first wound in a match, must make a test; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 120

keywords.name: Independent
keywords.definition: ----; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Infiltrator
keywords.definition: Cover rolls while the unit does not have an Advance or Run order are +1. Special Deployment Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 120

keywords.name: Inspiring Presence
keywords.definition: ----; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Medic
keywords.definition: When a friendly inf. or arty unit within 6in suffer damage from Small Arms, roll a D6 for each Damage. On a 6, ignore that damage; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Motorcycles
keywords.definition: See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 121

keywords.name: Observer
keywords.definition: Can be used as a spotter for Mortars or Howitzers; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Self-Defence
keywords.definition: Cannot fire weapons. Cannot initiate close quarters combat. Do not count towards victory conditions or KPs; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Shirkers
keywords.definition: Pins count double and must always take an order test, even without pins; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 121

keywords.name: Skis
keywords.definition: Troops ignore movement penalties for Snow or Winter Conditions; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Sniper
keywords.definition: Can use Scope at 36in to 12in for a sniper shot. +1 to hit, +1 to damage, no cover save, can pick the NCO of a squad as the wound target; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 122

keywords.name: Spotters
keywords.definition: Can be used to draw Line of Site from for Indirect Firing Howitzers or Mortars; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 102

keywords.name: Stubborn
keywords.definition: Ignores Pins on Morale Tests; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 122

keywords.name: Tank Hunters
keywords.definition: As a Winner in Close combat with an Armored Vehicle, resolve results on Damage Table. Squad does not suffer from Tanke Fear; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 121

keywords.name: Tough Fighters
keywords.definition: Model rerolls 1st Failed to Damage in Closed Combat; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 122

keywords.name: Winter equipment
keywords.definition: ----; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Amphibious
keywords.definition: Can move over impassable water at half speed; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: Armored All Round
keywords.definition: No Pen modifiers when being shot at in the side, rear, or from above; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: Command Vehicle
keywords.definition: Adds moreal bonus of +1 to itself and friendly vehicles within 12in and may use Snap To; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 113

keywords.name: Fast
keywords.definition: Tracked Vehicles with Fast Advance at 12in and Run at 24in; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: Medical Vehicle
keywords.definition: When a friendly inf. or arty unit within 6in suffer damage from Small Arms, roll a D6 for each Damage. On a 6, ignore that damage; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: One-Man Turret
keywords.definition: Pinned by hits from Small Arms. During an assault, destroyed automatically if damaged. Hits on top armor add additional +1 Pen and +1 to Damage Result; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 149

keywords.name: Recce
keywords.definition: Can Reverse at Full Advance Speed. Has access to 'Escape' Reaction; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 150

keywords.name: Reinforced Front Armor
keywords.definition: Frontal Armor Value is +1; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 150

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.definition: Advanced at 6in, Run at 12in; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 150

keywords.name: Slow Load
keywords.definition: Cannot be given an order until another friendly unit has been given an order; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 151

keywords.name: Turn on the Spot
keywords.definition: Can use Run Speed in Reverse; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 151

keywords.name: Turret Rear Mounted Machine Gun
keywords.definition: Fires opposite arc of the Main Gun or Coax after the Main or Coax is fired; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 151

keywords.name: Unreliable
keywords.definition: When vehicle suffers at least 1 pin, it suffers 1 additional pin; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 151

keywords.name: Weak Sides
keywords.definition: Shots against side armor count as rear armor instead (i.e. +2 to pen); Bolt Action, 3rd Edition: Pg. 151

keywords.name: Iron Discipline
keywords.definition: This unit may remove 2 pin markers rather than the usual one if an Order Test is passed; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Mixed Quality
keywords.definition: InEx Only; Roll a D6 on a Failed Order Test, See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Non-Polish Officers
keywords.definition: Cannot grant Morale Bonus to LWP Units; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Rangers Lead the Way!
keywords.definition: After setup, but before the first turn of the game as a part of beginning of game actions, this unit may make a Run Move; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Who Dares Wins!
keywords.definition: InEx Only; Roll a D6 on a Failed Order Test, See Full Rules; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition German Army Book: Pg. ---

keywords.name: Period: E|M|L
keywords.definition: Unit is Available in Early, Middle, or Late War scenarios; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Period: E|M
keywords.definition: Unit is Available in Early or Middle scenarios; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Period: M|L
keywords.definition: Unit is Available only in Middle or Late War scenarios; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Period: L
keywords.definition: Unit is Available only in Late War scenarios; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Flying Tank
keywords.definition: Ground Attack Aircraft comes in on a 4, 5, or 6. If a Ground Attack Aircraft performs the airstrike, 5 Hits are required to bring it down; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Flying Tank - Experimental
keywords.definition: Ignore the first Exceptional Damage Result of the game against this unit; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---

keywords.name: Massed Batteries
keywords.definition: When resolving Fire For Effect!, resolve the D6+6in by rolling 2D6 and picking the highest to use for the D6+6in; Bolt Action, 3rd Edition : Pg. ---
